mapper.sql: id, iccid, operators, receiver, phone, address,create_time,update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_excel_info(iccid, operators, receiver, phone, address, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{iccid},#{operators},#{receiver},#{phone},#{address},#{createTime},#{updateTime})

INSERT INTO t_excel_info(iccid, operators, receiver, phone, address, create_time, update_time) VALUES
(#{info.iccid},#{info.operators},#{info.receiver},#{info.phone},#{info.address},#{info.createTime},#{info.updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT iccid, operators, receiver, phone, address,create_time,update_time FROM t_excel_info a WHERE (a.receiver,a.phone,a.address) IN (SELECT receiver,phone,address from t_excel_info GROUP BY receiver,phone,address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) ORDER BY receiver

SELECT iccid, operators, receiver, phone, address,create_time,update_time FROM t_excel_info a where (a.receiver,a.phone,a.address) IN (SELECT receiver,phone,address from t_excel_info GROUP BY receiver,phone,address HAVING COUNT(*) <= 1) ORDER BY receiver
